trends: There has been one other sighting in Nome
There were no other sightings in Nome on or around December 9th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsLike I said I noticed them right off my back porch. I have had other join me to watch them. Some are too shocked to watch or too cold or freaked out. I tried to film them with my cell phone but they are too far away. I want a professional with the right equipment to film it with me. Nearly every time I go out they are their hoovering, then shooting off lights in triangle formation. Sometimes darting at incredible speeds. Please call or email me so a professional can look into this. I've seen this at least five times and nearly every time I chose to look.
Summary: I have seen them with other witness nearly every night over the past two weeks
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
